archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.2b: b) a basic knowledge of assets to be monitored, including their classification, location, criticality and ownership, to help identify critical assets and prioritise what a SOC should monitor
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
